title: font similar "livinghome"
content:
hello,

does someone knows fonts similar to this:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128112223im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Unbenannt-3_5340.jpg)

thanks, jens

 [‹ Chromeo tall slender font ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128112223/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39445 "Go to previous forum topic") [ID this typeface? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128112223/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39444 "Go to next forum topic")
author: yenzen

comments.content:
Your sample is Foundry Sterling.

[http://www.foundrytypes.co.uk/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128112223/http:/www.foundrytypes.co.uk/ "http://www.foundrytypes.co.uk/")

Similar? May be Bliss or Apex or Giacomo or ClearviewText or FS Ingrid or Verdana or something else...

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128112223im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Unbenannt-1_4492.jpg)
  
great. thanks.

just one more.. any idea about this one?

greetings jens

TF Forever Extra Light I would say.

[http://www.treacyfaces.com/sample.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128112223/http:/www.treacyfaces.com/sample.html "http://www.treacyfaces.com/sample.html")
For more options, see the Sans Serif section of our [extra light fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20071128112223/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/extra-thin-ultra-light-fonts/) list.
